Text: Last Day at Enronand colleagues Today Friday March is my final day at Enron It has been said Friends are the thermometer by which we may judge the temperature of our fortunes And so it is that on my last day at Enro n I count myself among the most fortunate My sincere thanks to you who have given me so much over the past three years and touched my life in so many ways I have found Enron to be a special place full of remarkable individuals and will always have fond memories of my time here On Monday I am going to Austin to join the George W Bush campaign Durin g this time of transition I can be reached at my new email address or on my cell phone I hope to ha ve new contact information to all of you by the first part of April Gods blessings to you for your kindness to me Please keep in touch Best regards Mike
